sect2.title: Substepper for Implicit Return Mapping Algorithms
sect2.para: Adaptive Substepper, employing an error estimation and Richardson extrapolation for an implicit return mapping algorithm.

sect2.title: Substepper for Semi - Explicit Return Mapping Algorithms
sect2.para: Adaptive Substepper, employing an error estimation and Richardson extrapolation for an semi - explicit return mapping algorithm.

sect2.title: Substepper for Implicit Return Mapping Algorithms
sect2.para: Perez Fouget Substepper for elastoplastic materials with an implicit return mapping algorithm.

sect2.title: Substepper for Semi - Explicit Return Mapping Algorithms
sect2.para: Perez Fouget Substepper for semi - explicit elastoplastic materials.

sect2.title: Modified Version to Consider Time-Variant Elastic Stiffness Tensor
